subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Racecar owner Roger Penske has never won a Cup race at Lowe’s Motor Speedway, and his two-car Dodge team are long shots in the Coca-Cola 600.
snippet: Racecar owner Roger Penske has never won a Cup race at Lowe’s Motor Speedway, and his two-car Dodge team are long shots in the Coca-Cola 600.
